name: xlsx-extended
description: out of the box writer and reader for xlsx

scripts.testold: node node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register test/*.coffee -R spec -u bdd
scripts.test2: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --report lcovonly -- --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register test/*.coffee -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.test: nyc node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register test/*.coffee -R spec -u bdd

author: SG Galileo Team
